info.title: Tazapay API
info.description: Filtered Tazapay API endpoints for documentation

post.description: This lets you initiate a payout.

amount.description: Amount in cents. For example if you want to payout $10.12 pass 1012 as the value. For decimal handling for various currencies, refer to the guide here

currency.description: ISO 4217 standard. This is the payout currency. The amount will be in the payout currency

address.description: Beneficiary Address (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet)

calling_code.description: Calling country code (for example, '1' for United States, '91' for India)

bank.description: Bank details if the destination_details.type is a bank account

account_number.description: Bank Account Number. Either account_number or IBAN is mandatory

iban.description: IBAN. Either account_number or iban is mandatory

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase

purpose_code.description: Purpose Code for INR bank accounts

firc_required.description: Pass `true` if you want FIRC for a payout to India. By default, it is set to `false`

wallet.description: Wallet details if the destination_details.type is a wallet

hosted.description: Indicates whether the wallet is custodial (hosted) or non-custodial (unhosted). Possible values: yes – The wallet is hosted by a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) or exchange. no – The wallet is non-custodial and controlled directly by the user (e.g., MetaMask, Ledger) Mandatory if party_classification is 'self' and destination_details.type is 'wallet'

vasp_name.description: The registered name of the Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) or exchange that hosts or manages the wallet Mandatory if party_classification is 'self', destination_details.type is 'wallet' and hosted is 'yes'

vasp_website.description: The official website URL of the VASP or exchange that manages the wallet. Used for VASP identification and due diligence under Travel Rule requirements Mandatory if party_classification is 'self', destination_details.type is 'wallet' and hosted is 'yes'

local_payment_network.description: Destination details if the destination_details.type is local_payment_network

type.description: Type of the local_payment_network (example - pix_brl, upi_inr, promptpay_thb)

deposit_key_type.description: Type of the deposit key. Conditionally Mandatory depending on the value of type

deposit_key.description: Deposit key corresponding to the type of local payment network (Example, PIX key for PIX, UPI handle for UPI, etc.)

tazapay_account.description: Destination details if the destination.type is tazapay_account

deposit_address.description: Deposit Address corresponding to a Tazapay account

tax_id.description: Tax ID of the beneficiary. (CPF or CPNJ number is mandatory for payouts to Brazil)

registration_number.description: Registration number of the business (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet and type is business)

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of individual, Format DD-MM-YYYY (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet and type is individual)

nationality.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code representing the beneficiary's nationality (e.g., US, GB, IN, FR). Optional field used for enhanced compliance screening.

party_classification.description: Type of relationship between beneficiary and creator of beneficiary Possible values - self, third_party (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet)

beneficiary.description: ID of an existing payout beneficiary

holding_currency.description: ISO 4217 standard, in uppercase. This is one of your balance currencies whose balance will fund the payout.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the payout object

type.description: Type of payout - local, swift, wallet, tazapay_account, local_payment_network

purpose.description: Reason for payout. Click here for the detailed list.

reference_id.description: Reference ID of the payout on your system

documents.description: Attach documents to the payout

type.description: A string mentioning the type of document. Possible values - invoice, other

on_behalf_of.description: ID of the entity the payout is created on behalf of

logistics_tracking_details.description: Logistics tracking details of the order

destination_fx_quote.description: ID of the quote to use locked exchange for conversion from payout to destination currency

quote.description: Quote ID from the payout quote API

fund_transfer_network.description: The local fund transfer network to use for local payouts (e.g., 'chats', 'fps', 'sepa', 'rtgs', 'ach', 'pix'). Fetch the entire list of available fund transfer networks from the Payout Bank Metadata API.

balance_transaction.description: Id of the balance transaction object linked to this payout

documents.description: List of beneficiary documents
Associated documents

holding_currency.description: Currency used for holding the funds before payout

holding_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for holding currency

metadata.description: Metadata associated with payout

payout_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for payout currency

purpose.description: Purpose code or note for payout

on_behalf_of.description: Entity on whose behalf payout is made

quote.description: Quote ID from the payout quote API

destination_fx_quote.description: ID of the quote to use locked exchange for conversion from payout to destination currency

logistics_tracking_details.description: Logistics tracking details of the order

available_balance.description: Available balance in the account for processing payouts

is_balance_sufficient.description: Indicates whether the account has sufficient balance to process this payout

fund_transfer_network.description: The local fund transfer network to use for local payouts (e.g., 'chats', 'fps', 'sepa', 'rtgs', 'ach', 'pix'). Fetch the entire list of available fund transfer networks from the Payout Bank Metadata API.

get.description: This lets you fetch the details of an existing payout

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the existing payout

message.description: Message returned as part of the API response

balance_transaction.description: Balance transaction id associated with this payout

state.description: State or province of the address

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the beneficiary (for individuals)

destination_details.description: Destination details depending on payout type

currency.description: Currency supported by the bank account

firc_required.description: Whether FIRC (Foreign Inward Remittance Certificate) is required

currency.description: Currency of the local payment network

deposit_key.description: Deposit key or identifier in local payment network

deposit_address.description: Deposit address of the Tazapay account

documents.description: Supporting documents for beneficiary verification

name_local.description: Local language name of the beneficiary

national_identification_number.description: National ID number of the beneficiary

calling_code.description: Country calling code of the phone

tax_id.description: Tax identification number of the beneficiary

verification_status.description: The verification status of the beneficiary

is_doc_verification_required.description: Signifies if doc verification is required

documents.description: Documents associated with payout

holding_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for holding currency

logistics_tracking_details.description: Logistics tracking details if payout is linked with goods

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the payout

on_behalf_of.description: On behalf of account ID if payout made for another entity

payout_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for payout currency

tracking_number.description: Tracking number (UETR, UTR, transaction hash, etc.)

quote.description: Quote ID from the payout quote API used to lock exchange rates

available_balance.description: Available balance in the account for processing payouts

is_balance_sufficient.description: Indicates whether the account has sufficient balance to process this payout

reversal_balance_transaction.description: Id of the reverse balance transaction object linked to this payout. Only present when status is 'reversed'

reversal_payout_fx_transaction.description: Reversal FX transaction details for payout currency. Only present when status is 'reversed'

errors.message: The resource you are trying to retrieve is not present. This error code happens when trying to Get or Read a data point (eg: transaction, user, KYB, etc) that does not exist.

put.description: This lets you update the details of an existing payout

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of an existing payout

metadata.description: Set of key value pairs to attach to the payout

reference_id.description: Reference ID of the payout on your system

message.description: Message returned as part of the API response

data.description: Returns the complete payout object with all fields including amount, beneficiary, beneficiary_details, currency, type, status, local (with fund_transfer_network), logistics_tracking_details, confirmation_documents, quote, available_balance, is_balance_sufficient, and other payout properties

post.description: Fund a payout which is in requires_funding

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of a payout in the state `requires_funding`

amount.description: Amount of the payout in payout currency

available_balance.description: Available balance in the holding currency account after this payout is processed

balance_transaction.description: ID of the balance transaction object linked to this payout

beneficiary.description: Unique identifier of the payout beneficiary

destination_details.description: Details of the destination account or bank

bank_codes.description: Bank identification codes such as ABA or SWIFT

firc_required.description: Indicates if FIRC document is required

documents.description: List of documents linked to the beneficiary

is_doc_verification_required.description: Indicates if document verification is required for the beneficiary

name_local.description: Local language name of the beneficiary

national_identification_number.description: National ID number of the beneficiary

party_classification.description: Classification of the party (self, third_party, etc.)

registration_number.description: Registration number of the beneficiary (for businesses)

type.description: Type of the beneficiary (individual or business)

charge_type.description: Charge type for the payout (e.g., ours, shared, beneficiary)

confirmation_documents.description: Array of confirmation documents like MT103, MT199, FIRC

created_at.description: Timestamp when the payout was created

documents.description: List of payout-related documents

holding_currency.description: Currency used to hold funds before payout

holding_fx_transaction.description: Details of FX transaction for holding currency conversion

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate used in holding FX

is_balance_sufficient.description: Indicates whether the account has sufficient balance to process this payout

local.description: Local payout configuration containing fund transfer network details

fund_transfer_network.description: The fund transfer network used for local payouts (e.g., chats, fps, sepa)

metadata.description: Metadata associated with the payout

on_behalf_of.description: Entity on whose behalf the payout is made

payout_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for payout currency

transaction_description.description: Description or memo for the payout transaction

logistics_tracking_details.description: Logistics tracking details for the payout

quote.description: Quote ID from the payout quote API

destination_fx_quote.description: ID of the quote to use locked exchange for conversion from payout to destination currency

get.description: Fetch Account Details using the tax ID

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: ISO 3166 standard alpha-2 code. eg: SG, IN, US, etc.

parameters.name: tax_id
parameters.description: Tax ID the account is linked to

status.description: Indicates whether the request to retrieve external account details was successful.

message.description: Additional message providing context about the response.

data.description: Contains details about the linked external accounts and their associated information.

account_holder_name.description: Name of the account holder associated with the external account.

accounts.description: List of external accounts linked to the user or entity.

bank.description: Bank account information for the external account.

account_number.description: Bank account number for the external account.

account_type.description: Type of bank account (e.g., savings, checking).

bank_codes.description: Bank code details used for identifying bank and branch.

branch_code.description: Branch code identifying the specific branch of the bank.

currency.description: Currency of the external account (ISO 4217 format).

type.description: Specifies the type of external account, typically 'bank'.

country.description: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) associated with the external account.

tax_id.description: Tax identification number linked to the external account holder.

get.description: Retrieve exchange rate between currency pairs

parameters.name: initial_currency
parameters.description: ISO 4217 standard specifies three-letter ("Alpha-3") codes. e.g. USD

parameters.name: final_currency
parameters.description: ISO 4217 standard specifies three-letter ("Alpha-3") codes. e.g. USD

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount in cents. For example if you want to charge $10.12 pass 1012 as the value. For decimal handling for various currencies, refer to the guide here

status.description: Indicates whether the FX conversion request was successful.

message.description: Additional information about the FX conversion operation, if any.

data.description: Contains detailed information about the currency conversion result.

amount.description: The amount that needs to be exchanged

converted_amount.description: The amount converted into the final currency, expressed in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

exchange_rate.description: The exchange rate applied for converting from the initial to the final currency.

final_currency.description: The target currency after conversion (ISO 4217 format).

initial_currency.description: The source currency before conversion (ISO 4217 format).

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the FX conversion was performed (ISO 8601 format).

get.description: This allows you to check the requirements with respect to bank fields for a given beneficiary country. These requirements will be made live on 30th April 2025, merchants must adhere to these requirements and update the integration on or before the deadline.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: 2-letter ISO country code. For e.g. US for United States

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: 3-letter currency code. For e.g. USD

status.description: Indicates whether the request to retrieve available payout methods was successful.

message.description: Additional message providing context or status information about the request.

data.description: Contains the list of available payout methods and their associated details.

payout_methods.description: List of payout methods available for the specified country and currency.

beneficiary_type.description: Specifies the types of beneficiaries supported for this payout method (e.g., individual or business).

country.description: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) for which the payout method is available.

currency.description: Currency supported for the payout method (ISO 4217 format).

custom_remitter_support.description: Indicates whether the payout method supports custom remitters (different sender names).

payout_type.description: Specifies the payout delivery channel or type (e.g., 'local', 'swift').

required_bank_codes.description: List of bank codes required for this payout method (e.g., SWIFT, IFSC).

required_bank_fields.description: List of required bank information fields that must be provided to initiate the payout.

required_beneficiary_fields.description: List of required beneficiary information fields that must be provided to complete the payout, typically address-related fields.

fund_transfer_networks.description: List of supported fund transfer networks for local payouts (e.g., 'chats', 'fps' for Hong Kong, 'sepa' for Europe). Only applicable for local payout types.

recommended_fields.description: These are conditionally required fields. Recommend to add them to make your payouts compatible with all our PSPs and hence lower the failure rates.

supported_destinations.description: List of supported destination countries or payout corridors for this method, if applicable.

transfer_limit.description: Defines the minimum and maximum payout limits for the given payout method.

currency.description: Currency in which the transfer limits are defined.

maximum.description: Maximum allowable payout amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

minimum.description: Minimum allowable payout amount in the smallest currency unit (e.g., cents).

url.description: Dynamically downloadable URL for document OR Shipment tracking URL

name.description: Name of the type in case the type is 'other'

reference.description: ID of the object for which the document is being submitted (checkout, escrow, payin)

description.description: Additional information about the document uploaded

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the document

status.description: Indicates whether the document upload or retrieval operation was successful.

message.description: Additional message or status detail for the API response.

data.description: Contains detailed information about the uploaded or retrieved document.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the document was created (ISO 8601 format).

description.description: Description or note associated with the document.

id.description: Unique identifier for the document in the system.

metadata.description: Additional metadata or custom key-value pairs related to the document, if any.

name.description: Display name or title of the document.

object.description: Indicates the type of object returned, typically 'document'.

reference.description: ID of the object (such as escrow or payout) that this document is associated with.

url.description: Public or signed URL for accessing or downloading the document.

post.description: This lets you create a beneficiary

address.description: Address (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet)

calling_code.description: Calling country code (for example, '1' for United States, '91' for India)

bank.description: Bank details if the destination_details.type is a bank account

account_number.description: Bank Account Number. Either account_number or IBAN is mandatory

iban.description: IBAN. Either account_number or iban is mandatory

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, in uppercase

purpose_code.description: Purpose Code for INR bank accounts

firc_required.description: Pass `true` if you want FIRC for a payout to India. By default, it is set to `false`

wallet.description: Wallet details if the destination_details.type is a wallet

hosted.description: Indicates whether the wallet is custodial (hosted) or non-custodial (unhosted). Possible values: yes – The wallet is hosted by a Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) or exchange. no – The wallet is non-custodial and controlled directly by the user (e.g., MetaMask, Ledger)  Mandatory if party_classification is 'self' and destination_details.type is 'wallet'.

vasp_name.description: The registered name of the Virtual Asset Service Provider (VASP) or exchange that hosts or manages the wallet Mandatory if party_classification is 'self', destination_details.type is 'wallet' and hosted is 'yes'

vasp_website.description: The official website URL of the VASP or exchange that manages the wallet. Used for VASP identification and due diligence under Travel Rule requirements Mandatory if party_classification is 'self', destination_details.type is 'wallet' and hosted is 'yes'

local_payment_network.description: Destination details if the destination_details.type is local_payment_network

type.description: Type of the local_payment_network (example - pix_brl, upi_inr, promptpay_thb)

deposit_key_type.description: Type of the deposit key. Conditionally Mandatory depending on the value of type

deposit_key.description: Deposit key corresponding to the type of local payment network (Example, PIX key for PIX, UPI handle for UPI, etc.)

deposit_address.description: Deposit Address corresponding to a Tazapay account

tazapay_account.description: Destination details if the destination_details.type is tazapay_account

destination.description: ID of the destination attached to the beneficiary

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the beneficiary

tax_id.description: Tax ID of the beneficiary. (CPF or CPNJ is mandatory for payouts to Brazil)

documents.description: Documents to attach to the beneficiary

type.description: A string mentioning the type of document (example - shareholding_pattern)

registration_number.description: Registration number of the business (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet and type is business)

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of individual, Format DD-MM-YYYY (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet and type is individual)

nationality.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code representing the beneficiary's nationality (e.g., US, GB, IN, FR). Optional field used for enhanced compliance screening.

party_classification.description: Type of relationship between beneficiary and creator of beneficiary Possible values - self, third_party (Mandatory if destination_details.type is a wallet)

schema.description: Represents a payout beneficiary with personal, contact, and destination details.

country.description: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) of the beneficiary.

line1.description: First line of the beneficiary's address.

postal_code.description: Postal or ZIP code of the beneficiary.

state.description: State or province of the beneficiary.

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the beneficiary in YYYY-MM-DD format.

nationality.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code representing the beneficiary's nationality.

destination.description: Identifier or reference to the beneficiary's payment destination (bank account, wallet, etc.).

destination_details.description: Details about the payout destination, such as wallet or bank.

type.description: Type of destination, such as 'wallet' or 'bank'.

wallet.description: Details of the wallet destination if applicable.

deposit_address.description: Wallet deposit address for receiving funds.

documents.description: List of documents associated with the beneficiary (e.g., ID proof, address proof).

name_local.description: Local language representation of the beneficiary's name, if applicable.

national_identification_number.description: National identification number or equivalent ID.

party_classification.description: Classification of the beneficiary, such as 'self', 'third_party', etc.

phone.description: Contact phone information of the beneficiary.

calling_code.description: Country calling code for the phone number.

registration_number.description: Registration or incorporation number for business beneficiaries.

tax_id.description: Tax identification number for the beneficiary.

type.description: Specifies whether the beneficiary is an 'individual' or a 'business'.

get.description: Provides real-time access to available funds across multiple currenices

status.description: Indicated whether the request is successful

message.description: Additional message and details about the request outcome.

amount.description: The balance amount available in your account.

object.description: Type of object returned by the API. In this case - Balance.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the balance was last updated (ISO 8601 format)

data.description: Contains information about the balance and its details

get.description: Provides real-time, detailed insights into individual balance movements, including charges, currency conversions, and adjustments, allowing you to track all credits and debits across multiple currencies

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the balance transaction you want to expand

status.description: Indicates whether the balance transaction retrieval was successful.

message.description: Additional message or information about the response.

amount.description: Total transaction amount in the smallest currency unit. A negative value represents a debit.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the balance transaction was created (ISO 8601 format).

currency.description: Currency of the balance transaction, in ISO 4217 format.

description.description: Description or memo associated with the balance transaction.

fee_details.description: Details of fees applied to this balance transaction.

amount.description: Fee amount applied, in the smallest currency unit. A negative value indicates deduction.

currency.description: Currency in which the fee was charged.

type.description: Type of fee applied (e.g., fixed_fee, variable_fee).

fx_conversions.description: Details of foreign exchange conversions applied within this transaction.

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate applied for this FX conversion.

amount.description: Final converted amount in smallest currency unit.
Initial amount before conversion in smallest currency unit.

id.description: Unique identifier for the balance transaction.

metadata.description: Additional metadata or custom attributes related to the transaction.

net.description: Net amount after fees and FX adjustments.

amount.description: Net amount after fees and FX conversions, in smallest currency unit.

currency.description: Currency of the net balance after all adjustments.

operation_type.description: Indicates whether the balance transaction is a credit or debit.

source.description: ID of the source object (e.g., payout, payin) linked to this balance transaction.

type.description: Specifies the transaction type, such as payout, payin, or refund.

post.description: Create a sub-entity for your account

description.description: A short description of the business

calling_code.description: Calling country code (for example, '1' for United States, '91' for India)

submit.description: true or false, default is false

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the representative, in format "DD-MM-YYYY"

nationality.description: Two-letter country code, in ISO format

calling_code.description: Calling country code (for example, '1' for United States, '91' for India)

ownership_percentage.description: Ownership percent, two digits after decimal is allowed

roles.description: Representative's role. Can be one or more than one of these: 'director', 'shareholder', 'beneficial_owner', 'authorised_signatory', 'authorised_representative', or 'other'

documents.description: Documents for the representatives

description.description: A short description of the document submitted

date_of_birth.description: Date of Birth in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD)

documents.description: Documents for the entity

description.description: A short description about the document uploaded

reference_id.description: Merchant's internal reference ID for the entity

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the entity

purpose_of_use.description: The capabilities the entity intends to use. Possible values - `collect`, `payout`. In case you only want to add global collection account on behalf of the entity, pass collect. If you want to only make payouts on behalf of the entity, use `payout`. In case you want to do both, pass `["collect","payout"]`

onboarding_package_url.description: Link to the complete onboarding package for the entity

on_behalf_of.description: ID of the entity this entity is created on behalf of

holding_info.description: Details about the holding currency and amount

payout_info.description: Information about payout currency and amount

destination_info.description: Information about destination currency and amount

fee_info.description: Breakdown of fixed and variable fees

in_holding_currency.description: Fixed fee amount in holding currency

in_payout_currency.description: Fixed fee amount in payout currency

in_holding_currency.description: Variable fee amount in holding currency

in_payout_currency.description: Variable fee amount in payout currency

exchange_rates.description: Exchange rates used in the payout quote

holding_to_payout.description: Exchange rate from holding to payout currency

payout_to_destination.description: Exchange rate from payout to destination currency

valid_until.description: Timestamp until which the quote is valid (ISO 8601 format)

created_at.description: Timestamp when the payout quote was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the payout quote was last updated

payout_type.description: Type of the payout. Possible values - `swift`, `local`, `local_payment_network`, `wallet`, `tazapay_account`

fund_transfer_network.description: Type of the fund_transfer_network (example - chats in HK).

local.description: Object containing additional details if the payout_type is local

amount.description: Amount in cents. For decimal currency handling, refer to this.
Amount in cents. For decimal currency handling, refer to this.

country.description: Two letter country code - in ISO format / Represents beneficiary bank country

destination_info.description: Amount in destination currency (currency in which beneficiary receives the funds)

type.description: Type of the local payment network

local_payment_network.description: Object containing additional details if the payout type is local_payment_network

wallet.description: Object containing additional details if the payout type is wallet

swift.description: Object containing additional details if the payout_type is `swift

amount.description: Amount of the payout in payout currency

balance_transaction.description: ID of the balance transaction associated with this payout

beneficiary.description: Unique identifier of the payout beneficiary

date_of_birth.description: Date of birth of the beneficiary (if applicable)

bank_codes.description: Bank identification codes such as SWIFT or ABA

firc_required.description: Indicates whether FIRC document is required

iban.description: IBAN number of the beneficiary account

documents.description: List of documents linked to the beneficiary

is_doc_verification_required.description: Signifies if doc verification is required

name_local.description: Name of the beneficiary in local language

national_identification_number.description: National ID or social security number

party_classification.description: Classification of the beneficiary party (if applicable)

registration_number.description: Company registration number if the beneficiary is a business

tax_id.description: Tax identification number of the beneficiary

charge_type.description: Type of charge (e.g., shared, ours, beneficiary)

confirmation_documents.description: List of confirmation documents uploaded for the payout

created_at.description: Timestamp when the payout was created

documents.description: List of payout-related documents

holding_currency.description: Currency in which funds are held before conversion

holding_fx_transaction.description: Details of FX transaction from holding to payout currency

logistics_tracking_details.description: Tracking details for logistics-related payouts (if applicable)

metadata.description: Metadata information related to payout

collect_id.description: Collection ID linked to this payout

mt103.description: SWIFT MT103 reference number, if applicable

on_behalf_of.description: Entity on whose behalf the payout is made

payout_fx_transaction.description: FX transaction details for payout conversion

exchange_rate.description: FX exchange rate for payout conversion

purpose.description: Purpose code or reason for the payout

source.description: Source collection ID for the payout

statement_descriptor.description: Statement descriptor shown on recipient’s statement

transaction_description.description: Description or purpose of the payout transaction

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the payout

source.description: ID of the collect to fund the payout

account_number.description: Account number of the payer bank

additional_information.description: Any additional information to be attached with the collect

on_behalf_of.description: Id of the entity on behalf of which the collect is created

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the collect

amount.description: Amount in BTC. The precision is 8 decimal places

d_tag_memo.description: This will be included in the d-tag. If both d_tag_memo and h_tag_memo are provided, only h_tag will be used

h_tag_memo.description: SHA-256 of the d_tag_memo. If both d_tag_memo and h_tag_memo are provided, only h_tag_memo will be used

expiry_interval.description: The expiry of the invoice in seconds. Default value is 3600 (1 hour)

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the lightning_invoice_bolt11 object

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of an existing lightning_invoice_bolt11

status.description: The status of the request - success or failure

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of an existing lightning invoice

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs to attach to the lightning_invoice object

parameters.name: starting_after
parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. Takes balance transaction object ID as input

parameters.name: ending_before
parameters.description: A cursor for use in pagination. Takes balance transaction object ID as input

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of objects to be fetched, by default 10, can be from 1 to 100

parameters.name: created.gt
parameters.description: Returns balance transactions created after this timestamp (greater than)

parameters.name: created.gte
parameters.description: Returns balance transactions created on or after this timestamp (greater than or equal to)

parameters.name: created.lt
parameters.description: Returns balance transactions created before this timestamp (less than)

parameters.name: created.lte
parameters.description: Returns balance transactions created on or before this timestamp (less than or equal to)
